src:
17項重要民生物資前10月價格年增率
06 Nov 2019, 19:32 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, 中央通訊社
主計總處6日發布10月消費者物價指數（CPI）年增0.39%，其中食物類漲幅1.65%最多，不過，蛋類價格創115個月來最大跌幅，抵銷部分漲幅。主計總處說，物價漲幅溫和，目前無通縮疑慮。中央社製圖 108年11月6日
text:
Annual increase in price of 17 important civilian resources in October
06 Nov 2019, 19:32 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, Central News Agency
The General Accounting Office released on October 6th that the Consumer Price Index (CPI) increased by 0.39% in October, of which the food category rose by 1.65%. However, the egg price hit the biggest decline in 115 months, offsetting some of the increase. The chief accounting office said that the price increase was moderate and there was no deflation. Central Society Charting November 6, 108
